p: Among the oral and injectable TCMs we reviewed, Jinhua Qinggan and Lianhua Qingwen are available over-the-counter. It is essential to educate patients if the symptoms are not relieved or disappeared; they should seek medical care. At present, Xuebijing has been approved by the CFDA with a new indication of "treating for the new coronavirus pneumonia with severe and critical systemic inflammatory response syndrome or/and multiple organ failure". Lianhua Qingwen was approved to indicate "treating for fever, cough, and fatigue caused by the light and ordinary types of the new coronavirus pneumonia" [ 70].
